title: Trigger Github Pages with Actions
snippet:
In the last post I briefly wrote about getting started this new year with creating my own blog. For that, I’m using the GitHub Pages to host the blog since is a free service.

    Published! You can read it at https://t.co/3J783VDbui— James Brooks...

title: New year, new goals
snippet:
It has only been 9 months since I landed my first job as a web developer but it feels like I have accomplished a lot of unexpected (but desired) goals.
So, I’ve decided to start this new decade with some achievable goals in mind, which I intend to get...
